solution_line_template: Hazel walked {distance_first_hour} x {multiplier_second_hour} = <<{distance_first_hour}*{multiplier_second_hour}={distance_second_hour}>>{distance_second_hour} kilometers in the second hour.
So, she walked {distance_first_hour} + {distance_second_hour} = <<{distance_first_hour}+{distance_second_hour}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} kilometers for 2 hours.
